img.alt: The Desert Star Garden is getting a makeover! - It will be revitalized as the Desert Star Founder’s Garden and dedicated to those families and staff who launched the school and supported its earliest years. The project will be introduced in stages, with setting the planting terraces, irrigation and some trees in the coming months. The design is a result of collaboration between Desert Star staff and John Bianchini of Earthweaver Landscaping. One or more community volunteer days will be scheduled to support the project. Watch for the next Clean, Green Scene announcement.

p.strong: The Desert Star Garden is getting a makeover!

div.p: It will be revitalized as the Desert Star Founder’s Garden and dedicated to those families and staff who launched the school and supported its earliest years. The project will be introduced in stages, with setting the planting terraces, irrigation and some trees in the coming months. The design is a result of collaboration between Desert Star staff and John Bianchini of Earthweaver Landscaping. One or more community volunteer days will be scheduled to support the project. Watch for the next Clean, Green Scene announcement.

p.a: A poem by Desert Star’s 7th grade teacher, Ellyn Hilliard

div.h1: Desert Star offers an Education that:
div.p: Integrates – art, music and movement into a classical academic education
Motivates – a child’s connection with nature
Fosters – healthy social development and community building
